title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of ECB Meeting
sub_head: All eyes this week are on Fridayâ€™s consumer-price index data, which are expected to show inflation held steady in May
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up, putting major indexes on track for opening gains as investors braced for a policy decision from the European Central Bank and the release of key inflation data later this week.
Futures for the S&P 500 on Thursday added 0.5%. Contracts for the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged up 0.4% and those for technology-focused Nasdaq-100 gained 0.6%. On Wednesday, all three major U.S. stock indexes finished lower, snapping a two-day winning streak.
